import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import {showErrMsg, showSuccessMsg} from '../utils/notification/Notification' import BreadCrumb from '../BreadCumb' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', password: '', cf_password: '', err: '', success: '' } function Register() { const [user, setUser] = useState(initialState) const {name, email, password,cf_password, err, success} = user const handleChangeInput = e => { const {name, value} = e.target setUser({...user, [name]:value, err: '', success: ''}) } return ( <>
{err && showErrMsg('error',err)} {success && showSuccessMsg('success',success)}

); } export default Register;
